people_design.title: design & deploy
people_design.promise: build learning experiences your team actually wants to use.
people_design.quadrantStory: you're in the people Ã— design quadrantâ€”where behaviour change meets creative craft. this is where we build the tools that shift mindsets, not just transfer information.
people_design.story: we start with a discovery session to understand your learning goals and audience. then we move into rapid prototypingâ€”sketching session flows, testing activities, and iterating based on what we learn. we pilot the experience with a real cohort, gather structured feedback, and refine the design. by the end, you have a learning experience that's been tested in the field and is ready to scale.
people_design.crossover: our design work is always informed by researchâ€”we build in feedback loops and measurement from day one, so you're not just launching something that feels good, but something you can prove works.

outcomes.title: co-designed session kit
outcomes.detail: we work alongside your team to build a facilitation toolkit that reflects your culture, your language, and your goalsâ€”not an off-the-shelf template.

outcomes.title: live pilot with real feedback
outcomes.detail: we run the first session with you, capturing participant responses in real-time to see what lands and what needs refinement.

outcomes.title: production-ready handoff
outcomes.detail: you get a polished kit with facilitator notes, participant materials, and a train-the-trainer guide so your team can run it independently.

examples.title: PRME active learning workshop
examples.detail: a 3-hour workshop designed for business school faculty to integrate sustainability principles into their teaching practice.

examples.title: play-based learning session
examples.detail: watch how we facilitated a playful learning experience for 40 educators, using game mechanics to explore complex systems thinking.

people_research.title: pinpoint & prove
people_research.promise: show exactly where your approach moves the needleâ€”with evidence that stands up to scrutiny.
people_research.quadrantStory: you're in the people Ã— research quadrantâ€”where rigorous measurement meets human complexity. this is where we prove that your interventions actually change how people think, feel, and act.
people_research.story: we begin by mapping your theory of change to measurable outcomes. then we design a lightweight evaluation approachâ€”selecting validated instruments or creating custom measures that fit your context. we collect baseline data, observe your intervention in action, and gather post-programme responses. the analysis goes beyond simple comparisons to explore moderators and mechanisms. you receive a findings deck that tells the story of your impact in language your stakeholders understand.
people_research.crossover: research without design is just measurement. we bring a designer's eye to how we collect dataâ€”making surveys engaging, interviews conversational, and dashboards actionable. the best evidence comes from participants who actually want to engage with your evaluation.

outcomes.title: pinpoint what's working
outcomes.detail: we identify the specific mechanisms driving changeâ€”not just whether something worked, but why and for whom.

outcomes.title: credible evidence of change
outcomes.detail: you get pre-post data, effect sizes, and confidence intervals that satisfy funders, boards, and skeptics.

outcomes.title: actionable insights for scale
outcomes.detail: we don't just measureâ€”we tell you what to amplify, what to adjust, and what to drop as you grow.

examples.title: programme impact report
examples.detail: a comprehensive evaluation of a 6-month leadership programme, showing 34% improvement in systems thinking and 28% increase in collaborative problem-solving.

examples.title: MEL dashboard
examples.detail: an interactive monitoring dashboard that tracks participant engagement, learning outcomes, and satisfaction in real-time across multiple cohorts.

product_design.title: build & iterate
product_design.promise: launch a polished, tested product in two sprintsâ€”not two years.
product_design.quadrantStory: you're in the product Ã— design quadrantâ€”where learning science meets rapid prototyping. this is where we build the tools, games, and experiences that teach through doing.
product_design.story: we kick off with a concept sprintâ€”exploring the problem space, sketching multiple approaches, and converging on the strongest direction. then we prototype rapidly, building just enough to test our core assumptions. playtests happen early and often, with real users in realistic contexts. we synthesise findings after each round and iterate. by the end of sprint two, you have a validated concept and a clear path to production.
product_design.crossover: great products don't just emerge from intuitionâ€”they're shaped by evidence. we bake research into every sprint, testing assumptions with users and measuring learning outcomes. design and research aren't separate phases; they're intertwined throughout.

outcomes.title: working prototype in 2 sprints
outcomes.detail: not wireframes or mockupsâ€”a functional prototype you can put in front of real users and learn from immediately.

outcomes.title: playtest insights
outcomes.detail: we run structured playtests with your target users, capturing what delights, what confuses, and what needs to change.

outcomes.title: implementation specification
outcomes.detail: a detailed handoff document that lets your dev team build with confidenceâ€”including edge cases, accessibility requirements, and content guidelines.

examples.title: learning game prototype
examples.detail: a playable prototype of a card game that teaches climate systems thinking, tested with 200+ players across 5 iteration cycles.

examples.title: design handoff spec
examples.detail: a comprehensive design system and implementation guide for an educational app, including component library, interaction patterns, and accessibility annotations.

product_research.title: test & validate
product_research.promise: prove your product meets accessibility and learning standardsâ€”before you ship.
product_research.quadrantStory: you're in the product Ã— research quadrantâ€”where user experience meets rigorous validation. this is where we make sure your product actually works for the people it's meant to serve.
product_research.story: we start with a heuristic reviewâ€”our team evaluates your product against established UDL principles and usability heuristics. then we recruit representative users for moderated testing sessions, observing how they navigate real tasks. we capture video, quantitative metrics, and qualitative feedback. the analysis identifies patterns across users and prioritises issues by impact. you receive a findings report with specific, actionable recommendations and clips that bring the user voice to life.
product_research.crossover: validation isn't the end of the storyâ€”it's the beginning of better design. our research always points toward solutions, not just problems. we work closely with your design and dev teams to translate findings into improvements that ship.

outcomes.title: UDL compliance score
outcomes.detail: a structured assessment against Universal Design for Learning guidelines, with specific ratings across engagement, representation, and action/expression.

outcomes.title: usability issues mapped
outcomes.detail: a prioritised list of friction points, dead ends, and confusionâ€”categorised by severity and linked to specific user sessions.

outcomes.title: stakeholder-ready brief
outcomes.detail: a clear, visual summary that communicates findings to leadership, with recommended fixes and estimated impact.

examples.title: UDL audit report
examples.detail: a comprehensive accessibility audit of a museum's interactive exhibits, with specific recommendations that improved UDL scores from 62% to 89%.
